name: Stronkey Kong
description:
The mighty Stronkey Kong has kidnapped your significant other! He was also cunning enough to destroy all the scaffolding that would let you climb up to him!

You’re gonna need to score some points and buy some scaffolding from the nearby Scaffolding Company.

Controls.

WASD : Run around, climb ladders, enter doors.

MOUSE : Building tiles.

MOUSE WHEEL or NUMBER KEYS : Select tile to build with.

Additional tips:

Tiles have specific rules for where they can be placed. Scaffolding can only be placed on the ground and other scaffolding, as long as there isn’t a girder attached to it. Ladders need to hang from girders or other ladders. Girders must be placed on scaffolding.
